name: v1.6.1 - Version Display & Update Improvements
body:
## UI Improvements

### Version Display
- Main menu header now shows version
- Tools menu shows current version next to Update option
- Update screen shows current vs available version
- Checks GitHub API for latest release

### IP Address Fix
- Header now shows current IP address (not from config file)
- IP updates when server IP changes

### How to Update
```
server-setup > Tools & Monitoring > Update server-setup
```
